subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre dismantled a bumbling corps of Giants defensive backs in a victory that was the 149th in Favre’s career, setting a record for the most by an N.F.L. quarterback.
snippet: Brett Favre dismantled a bumbling corps of Giants defensive backs in a victory that was the 149th in Favre’s career, setting a record for the most by an N.F.L. quarterback.
